about_the_game:
Making games takes time and can be costly. As such, this DLC is meant as a form of donation to the developer, so they can continue working on many more games!

This DLC includes no content that cannot be found in-game through winning specific challenges. However, as thanks, the following bonus content will be unlocked (if it wasn't already):
  • A game not previously released on Steam, titled World Annihilation Operations: Space Manipulation. It showcases various sci-fi and surreal environments in which space seems unstable. From impossible objects, to teleportation portals, or multiple depths of reflections, explore 5 levels of weird visuals while occasionally solving environmental puzzles.
  • A second much smaller game, never released anywhere, developed in the context of a game prototype design class a few years ago. It is a simple platformer game set in a long tunnel where gravity works in mysterious ways.

This DLC includes no content that cannot be found in-game through winning specific challenges. However, as thanks, the following bonus content will be unlocked (if it wasn't already):

From impossible objects, to teleportation portals, or multiple depths of reflections, explore 5 levels of weird visuals while occasionally solving environmental puzzles.
  • A second much smaller game, never released anywhere, developed in the context of a game prototype design class a few years ago. It is a simple platformer game set in a long tunnel where gravity works in mysterious ways.

short_description: This DLC is meant as a form of donation to the developer, so they can continue working on many more games! It includes no content that cannot be unlocked in-game through challenges. As thanks however, some of the bonus content will be unlocked if it wasn't already.
